abstract: High-profile harassment lawsuit going to trial has huge implications for gender issues in Silicon Valley; Ellen Pao, former employee from venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, claims she was discriminated against by firm after affair with married colleague; guilty verdict will be portrayed as indictment of high-tech industry, while dismissal could bolster rationale that gender issues are overplayed.
lead_paragraph: A high-profile harassment lawsuit brought against the prominent venture capital firm comes as attention mounts on gender issues in Silicon Valley.

headline.main: Ellen Pao Suit Against Kleiner Perkins Heads to Trial, With Big Potential Implications
headline.print_headline: A Silicon Valley Harassment Trial Casts a Long Shadow

snippet: A high-profile harassment lawsuit brought against the prominent venture capital firm comes as attention mounts on gender issues in Silicon Valley.
